org.trianacode.taskgraph.service

Class RunnableParameterNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.taskgraph.imp.NodeImp
      • org.trianacode.taskgraph.imp.ParameterNodeImp
        • org.trianacode.taskgraph.service.RunnableParameterNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NodeListener, TaskListener, Node, ParameterNode, RunnableNodeInterface

    public class RunnableParameterNode
extends ParameterNodeImp
implements RunnableNodeInterface, TaskListener
    A NodeCable which has run-time parameters.
